parameters.name: is.multiple.combine.wide
parameters.text: FALSE

parameters.name: dims
parameters.text: the dimension data of the MSImaging raw data. it should be a numeric vector with at least two element standards for ``[w, h]``; or a list object with at least two slot elements which are named ``w`` and ``h``.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.text: a numeric factor for describ the pixel scale size in MSImaging rendering process. default value is 1 means no scale, just rendering of the origina size!

parameters.name: padding
parameters.text: the padding element is a numeric vector with four elements standards for css padding value: ``[top, right, bottom, left]``.

parameters.name: is_multiple_combine_wide
parameters.text: the function will trying to make the aspect ratio equals to 1:1 if this parameter value is set to false by default.

parameters.name: ratio_scale
parameters.text: the scale of the ratio value should not be 1, due to the reason of ``1`` means no changes.

autoSize.returns: this function returns a list object that contains the recommended size value for the MSImaging plot. the result value contains two slot elements: size element is a dimension vector with two elements standards for ``[w, h]``.
autoSize.title: evaluate of the canvas size and padding

.auto_size_internal.returns: A size numeric vector with two elements: w,h
.auto_size_internal.title: Evaluate the canvas size

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.text: getOption(mzdiff, default = da:0.3)

parameters.name: mz
parameters.text: the m/z value of the target ion

geom_red.returns: a ggplot layer object for do MS-imaging rendering.
geom_red.title: Do MSI rendering for mz as red layer

geom_green.title: Do MSI rendering for mz as green layer

geom_blue.title: Do MSI rendering for mz as blue layer

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.text: getOption(mzdiff, default = da:0.3)

parameters.name: colorSet
parameters.text: Jet

parameters.name: strict
parameters.text: TRUE

parameters.name: ions_data
parameters.text: a list of MSI layers data, each element in this list should also be a list object that contains data slots: 1. type  precursor type information string 2. title   the ion metabolite name 3. layer   the MSI ion layer data 4. mz      the target ion m/z value

parameters.name: savePng
parameters.text: ./Rplot.png

parameters.name: ionName
parameters.text: NULL

parameters.name: colorMap
parameters.text: NULL

parameters.name: MSI.colorset
parameters.text: viridis:turbo

parameters.name: ggStatPlot
parameters.text: NULL

parameters.name: backcolor
parameters.text: black

parameters.name: regions
parameters.text: NULL

parameters.name: mzpack
parameters.text: a mzpack data object used for do MS-imaging or other data object that contains the ms-imaging layer data and could be recognized by the ggplot ms-imaging function.

parameters.name: ionName
parameters.text: the display title string. the ion m/z value will be used if this parameter leaves default NULL.

parameters.name: mz
parameters.text: the target ion m/z value.

parameters.name: met
parameters.text: should be a list data object that contains the sample data, which this list the key names is the sample id set and the corresponding element value is the sample intensity value.

parameters.name: sampleinfo
parameters.text: a data list set which could be used for defined the sample group information and the plot color value. this list data should be contains at least 3 required data fields: 1. group: the sample group name, used for display as the title label of each group data 2. id: a character vector that contains the necessary sample id reference to get the required sample data for each data group 3. color: a single character string value in html color format for specific the color of the bar/box/violin stat plot.

parameters.name: colorMap
parameters.text: a list object that contains the color set value that used for rendering the stat chartting, example as box/bar/violin. this list data object the key names should be the sample group tag and the corresponding value must be the sample intensity data value.

parameters.name: MSI_colorset
parameters.text: the color map name for do MS-imaging rendering, default color scale name is ``viridis:turbo``.

parameters.name: ggStatPlot
parameters.text: default is bar plot.

parameters.name: combine_layout
parameters.text: the layout of the stat charting and the MS-imaging plot. a numeric vector that contains two value element, first is the width percentage of the stats chart and the second one is the width percentage of the single ion ms-imaging.

parameters.name: savePng
parameters.text: the filepath to save the image plot output.

parameters.name: backcolor
parameters.text: the background color of the MS-imaging plot

MSI_ionStatPlot.title: Stat plot combine with the MS-imaging

parameters.name: raw
parameters.text: the mzpack object

npixels.returns: the pixel counts(each pixel in the MS-imaging 2D plain is a ms1 scan in mzpack raw data).
npixels.title: count the scan ms1
